heroDescription: Born from a passion for waterfowl hunting and a dedication to craft, Cold Front Calls creates premium acrylic calls that cut through any conditions.
storyParagraphs: Cold Front Calls was founded with a simple mission: create waterfowl calls that perform when it matters most. After years of hunting in every condition imaginable, we knew what was missing from the market.

Each call starts as a solid block of premium acrylic, carefully selected for its acoustic properties. From there, it's hand-turned on a precision lathe, shaped with intention and expertise developed over thousands of hours.
The result? A call that delivers tone so cutting it'll bring birds in through the worst fronts. That's why we say: Hunt the Front.

values.title: Precision Tone
values.description: Every call is tuned to cut through any weather condition, delivering crystal-clear sound that carries.

values.title: Handcrafted Quality
values.description: Each piece is hand-turned on a lathe, ensuring unique character and premium craftsmanship in every call.

values.title: Competition Tested
values.description: Our calls have earned recognition in competitions across the country, proving their real-world performance.

values.title: Hunter Community
values.description: Built by hunters, for hunters. We understand the demands of the field and build accordingly.

ctaDescription: Browse our collection and find the perfect call for your next hunt.
